about_the_game:
All Gameplay shown is from very early in the development.

Umbra's Cauldron is a card-based alchemy simulation where every element of the game is a card. Combine them to discover unique items, countless recipes and progress through the 7 Steps of Alchemy. Can you unleash your inner alchemist and discover them all?

Stack Cards
Drag, stack, and combine cards to gather resources, craft unique items, and create powerful alchemy recipes.

Sell Cards
Sell your cards to earn Gems, which can be used to purchase new card packs. Each pack contains a variety of resources to enhance your alchemical capabilities. Unlock new card packs and rare cards as you progress through the stages of alchemy.


Features
  • Many unique cards
  • 7 Steps of Alchemy, each with a unique tool
  • Beautiful Illustrations
  • Countless recipes to discover and explore
